channel.title: RiotScape v1 Open Source + Client Download!
channel.description:
[size=36pt]RIOTSCAPE CLIENT + SOURCE!!![/size]
So im releasing a 317 i made credits go to Allstar for Source Base and Galkon for Client Base...Me for huge editing done Client: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=d3fe2db2d7f62d36b94117dade8fc295e04e75f6e8ebb871]http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=d3fe2db2d7f62d36b94117dade8fc295e04e75f6e8ebb871[/url] Source: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=9f1901fc0a7cacb008f8df73f2072ed6e04e75f6e8ebb871]http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=9f1901fc0a7cacb008f8df73f2072ed6e04e75f6e8ebb871[/url]
And Now for Pics! [url=http://img4.imageshack.us/gal.php?g=screenshot0046.png]http://img4.imageshack.us/gal.php?g=screenshot0046.png[/url] if you want to look at them or Slideshow [url=http://img4.imageshack.us/slideshow/player.php?id=img4/6782/1240290944s8e.smil]http://img4.imageshack.us/slideshow/player.php?id=img4/6782/1240290944s8e.smil[/url]
If you say there's already a RiotScape out...yes there is...But I've had this for A year and never released or even hosted it just a project for me...You MUST have my client because the ancients altar is mine and i've changed the portals and added too many customs for Silab or another server to log in on...yes client is big...but If i wanted some random noob to come leech and just make this amazing server/client bundle there's I would've put pics up...this is only for serious coders who want a source thats already made and that works great...I edited allstar but unfortunatly I regrew much of the size with my ideas...some of the features are.. SYI and NULL protection...100% 3 PK Zones which eliminates a big buzz around one so less rule breaking... In the home area my house has observation area so you can watch over the entire home area One hit ring and ammy for admins to take care of glitchers in pk IPBAN is 100% my own i completely remade allstar's so it works like a charm There is a mess up in client with models to make sure only serious coders get it...nothing hard just fix the model ids in class8.java in the client file to fix it eliminated tunnel barrows as in a 317 Silab version it laggs terribly MANY MORE FOR YOU GUYS TO SEE!!!!!
If you leech give me galkon and allstar credit atleast please....
Comment or ill Take down!!!
Logan-RiotScape Owner

item.title: RiotScape v1 Open Source + Client Download!
item.dc:creator: @Logan3 Logan3
item.description:
@Logan3 wrote:

Just wondering what part of a year didn’t you get? I’ve been on the other and they haven’t been around as long and they haven’t worked on theirs as much…So I could take it up with them cause i have videos from a year ago that show it clearly. Quite frankly also I dont care what you think…how many servers have you made? I have a 503 a 525 and a 474 delta based im working on 503 is never seen anymore so I’m making it pretty much by myself on it. So really think about what you say before you say it

Read full topic

item.title: RiotScape v1 Open Source + Client Download!
item.dc:creator: @Logan3 Logan3
item.description:
@Logan3 wrote:

[size=36pt]RIOTSCAPE CLIENT + SOURCE!!![/size]

So im releasing a 317 i made credits go to Allstar for Source Base and Galkon for Client Base…Me for huge
editing done
Client:
http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=d3fe2db2d7f62d36b94117dade8fc295e04e75f6e8ebb871
Source:
http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=9f1901fc0a7cacb008f8df73f2072ed6e04e75f6e8ebb871

And Now for Pics!
http://img4.imageshack.us/gal.php?g=screenshot0046.png
if you want to look at them or
Slideshow
http://img4.imageshack.us/slideshow/player.php?id=img4/6782/1240290944s8e.smil

If you say there’s already a RiotScape out…yes there is…But I’ve had this for A year and never released or even hosted it just a project for me…You MUST have my client because the ancients altar is mine and i’ve changed the portals and added too many customs for Silab or another server to log in on…yes client is big…but If i wanted some random noob to come leech and just make this amazing server/client bundle there’s I would’ve put pics up…this is only for serious coders who want a source thats already made and that works great…I edited allstar but unfortunatly I regrew much of the size with my ideas…some of the features are…
SYI and NULL protection…100%
3 PK Zones which eliminates a big buzz around one so less rule breaking…
In the home area my house has observation area so you can watch over the entire home area
One hit ring and ammy for admins to take care of glitchers in pk
IPBAN is 100% my own i completely remade allstar’s so it works like a charm
There is a mess up in client with models to make sure only serious coders get it…nothing hard
just fix the model ids in class8.java in the client file to fix it
eliminated tunnel barrows as in a 317 Silab version it laggs terribly
MANY MORE FOR YOU GUYS TO SEE!!!

If you leech give me galkon and allstar credit atleast please…

Comment or ill Take down!!!

Logan-RiotScape Owner
